summary: My friend asked me to see if I could do a glitter specular map while I was working on WetBumps . This was more of an accident trying to get varying texture but this was the result .
descriptionHtml:
A little accident going a long way this is basically what it is . In my friends words "it looks awesome ." 


    This was designed around unp variant . This may not be everyone's cup of tea it is not a wet map but more of a glitter / paint .  This will replace wet look .

  

    You can install this with either mod organizer or nmm . If you know what you are doing manually  .




  This is my work and permissions are open for anyone who wants to try and make it better  . The butterflies and leaves are paint shop pro 9 picture tubes . I do not anticipate making any other version . If you post any screenies please keep them SFW .


[size=3]    First and foremost I would like to thank Alpineyj he tested it and it was with his encouragement this is seeing the light of day . Second he took the higher resolution images for me . So Thank You . [/size]
author: cald123
